name: clankie
description: A minimal personal AI assistant built on pi's SDK

scripts.build: bun build src/cli.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm && chmod +x dist/cli.js
scripts.build:web-ui: cd web-ui && bun install && bun run build && cd .. && rm -rf web-ui-dist && cp -r web-ui/.output/public web-ui-dist
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run build && bun run build:web-ui
